title: That the Finance Committee meeting minutes of August 14 and August 16 and 17, 2023 be approved.

That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report FCSSFS23-001, dated October 10, 2023 of the Commissioner of Finance and Corporate Support Services as follows: a) That the 2023 Audit Plan for the Corporation of the City of Peterborough, attached to Report FCSSFS23-001 as Appendix A, be received; and b) That the Mayor and Chair of the Finance Committee be authorized to sign the Audit Planning Report, attached to Report FCSSFS23-001 as Appendix B.
That this meeting be adjourned at 5:59 p.m.
